briefdescription.para: An entity handle, essentially just an int.

memberdef.argsstring: (RenderConfig, RenderAPI, ViewportWidth, ViewportHeight, DepthTest, CullFace, MSAA)
memberdef.name: SERIALIZE

detaileddescription.para: This function can be used to resolve paths relative to the configured project or engine resource roots. Use res:// to refer to project resources and int:// to refer to engine resources.

simplesect.para: string Absolute counterpart to the given path

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a unit vector in the direction of the passed vector.
vec
Vector to be normalized
Unit vector

Calculate the cross product of two vectors.
a
First vector
b
Second vector
Result of the cross product

Calculate a transformation matrix to that will make an object look towards a particular point.
eye
Position of the "eye" of the object
center
Point to look at
up
Direction representing "up" for the object
Transformation matrix

memberdef.argsstring: (float fov, float aspectRatio, float zNear, float zFar)
memberdef.name: LPerspective

detaileddescription.para:
Calculate a transformation matrix to bring the object into clip space with a perspective projection.
fov
Half-angle field of view in degrees
aspectRatio
Aspect ratio of the projection
zNear
Frustum near cut-off
zFar
Frustum far cut-off
Transformation matrix

Add a translation to a transformation matrix.
mat
Matrix to translate
translationVec
Vector to translate along. Magnitude represents distance.
Updated transformation matrix

Add a scale to a transformation matrix
mat
Matrix to scale
scaleVec
Scale along X, Y and Z
Updated transformation matrix

Add a rotation to a transformation matrix
mat
Matrix to rotate
deg
Angle to rotate in degrees
axis
Axis to rotate along
Updated transformation matrix

Get a pointer to the matrix data. Required because of GLM internals.
mat
Matrix to get the pointer to
Float pointer to the matrix data

Get a pointer to the vector data. Required because of GLM internals.
vec
Vector to get the pointer to
Float pointer to the vector data

briefdescription.para: Get the active instance of the resource cache.

detaileddescription.para: A resource cache is an EnTT resource cache initialized in the engine dll. This function returns a reference to that cache instance. Each resource has a corresponding template specialization in AssetRegistry.cpp

parameterdescription.para: Type of the resource to fetch the cache for

simplesect.para: A reference to the cache instance

briefdescription.para: Load an asset from the given path, or provide the existing asset if already loaded.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the resource to load
Type of the resource loader to use
Types of arguments to be passed to the resource loader
Path of the resource to be loaded
Arguments to be passed to the resource loader

simplesect.para: Handle to the loaded resource instance from the resource cache

briefdescription.para: Execute a function for each asset in the resource cache.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the resource that is under consideration
Type of the function pointer to execute
